text: The capital of France is Paris.
Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.
The sun is a star located at the center of our solar system.
Humans have 23 pairs of chromosomes.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space with the naked eye.
Goldfish have a memory span of only 3 seconds.
The moon is made of cheese.
Sharks are mammals.
The Earth is approximately 4.5 billion years old.
Lightning never strikes the same place twice.
The human brain contains approximately 86 billion neurons.
Bats are blind.
The speed of light in a vacuum is approximately 299,792,458 meters per second.
The Great Pyramid of Giza was built by aliens.
Oxygen is essential for human respiration.
The Amazon rainforest produces 20% of the world's oxygen.
DNA stands for deoxyribonucleic acid.
The human heart has four chambers.
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain on Earth.
The Bermuda Triangle causes ships and planes to disappear mysteriously.
